topic.title: Anyone knows how to recover big amount of lost data ?
topic.body:
I mean, I have made a backup of my computer on an external drive. I thought it failed so I removed everything. But, in fact, the backup had succeed, so I want to know if there's a software that can restore files where they are in the external drive, without copying them on another disk (as if they were re-indexed).
PS: Data is not damaged, of course.

1583652466_12cd6EZPPnYus8unwYEjFxKYWps2k.body: This software looks powerful, but I haven't figured out how to do what I want. When I try to recover a file, it asks me for a destination folder instead of restoring it on site.
